entry.title: Selling Signatures: Another Reason to Move to Payment Points
entry.summary: The email thread contains discussions on various topics related to Lightning Network and cryptocurrency. The first email discusses the concept of payment points and provides links to threads where ZmnSCPxj talks about their potential benefits. The second email contains a detailed write-up on how to make a DLC, along with a link to an article that explains the concept of CETs. A subsequent email discusses the use of payment points with scalars to ensure that buyers only pay for valid signatures, which can be useful in scenarios such as offering DLC-like option contracts. Overall, the emails provide insights into different aspects of the Lightning Network and its applications.
